type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ApplicationBarAutomationPeer
type.summary: Comes as a provider of the type for the UI Automation technology.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ApplicationBarAutomationPeer.#ctor(Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBar)
method.summary: Creates a new instance of the class .
method.param: An instance of the class , for which the provider will be used.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ApplicationBarAutomationPeer.GetClassNameCore
method.summary: Returns such a class name , which is connected with current object. This method is called by .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ApplicationBarAutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlTypeCore
method.summary: Returns such a type of the control , which is connected with current object. This method is called by .
method.ensures: The being returned value is a value of AutomationControlType.Menu .
